document.discussion_title: CLS Holdings plc (CLI) Earns Buy Rating from Liberum Capital | Daily Political
document.topic_text: Tweet Liberum Capital reiterated their buy rating on shares of CLS Holdings plc (LON:CLI) in a research report released on Wednesday. The brokerage currently has a GBX 1,600 ($20.60) price target on the stock. A number of other research firms also recently issued reports on CLI. Peel Hunt restated a buy rating and issued a GBX 1,800 ($23.18) target price on shares of CLS Holdings plc in a report on Thursday, May 12th. Panmure Gordon reiterated a buy rating and set a GBX 2,016 ($25.96) price objective on shares of CLS Holdings plc in a research note on Tuesday, July 19th. In other CLS Holdings plc news, insider Mortstedt,Sten A acquired 4,264 shares of the firm’s stock in a transaction on Tuesday, June 28th. The stock was bought at an average cost of GBX 1,276 ($16.43) per share, for a total transaction of £54,408.64 ($70,060.06). Also, insider Widlund,Fredrik bought 1,000 shares of CLS Holdings plc stock in a transaction dated Monday, June 27th. The shares were purchased at an average cost of GBX 1,301 ($16.75) per share, for a total transaction of £13,010 ($16,752.51). Shares of CLS Holdings plc ( LON:CLI ) opened at 1400.00 on Wednesday. CLS Holdings plc has a 52 week low of GBX 1,125.00 and a 52 week high of GBX 1,930.00. The company’s 50-day moving average is GBX 1,354.51 and its 200 day moving average is GBX 1,485.73. The stock’s market cap is GBX 576.11 million. CLS Holdings plc is a United Kingdom-based investment property company, which is involved in the investment, management and development of commercial properties, and in other investments. The Company invests primarily in office buildings. It operates in two divisions: Investment Property and Other Investments.
